actions: Promotes urination and leaches out Dampness.
Opens the Lungs, spreads Lung Qi, expels Phlegm, benefits the throat and directs the effects of other herbs to the upper body.
With Gan Cao, disseminates Lung Qi, expels Phlegm, resolves toxicity, and expels pus for productive cough due to Wind-Heat.
With Gan Cao and Huang Qin, for hoarseness, pain and swelling of the throat due to Wind-Heat
Astringes leakage of Lung Qi, stops cough, tonifies the Kidneys, astringes Jing and sweat and generates fluids.
Regulates and descends Qi, adjusts the Middle, relieves the diaphragm, dries Dampness and transforms Phlegm.
Tonifies, invigorates and harmonizes the Blood, stops cough and treats dyspnea.
Nourishes the Kidney Yin, clears Lung Heat, sedates Fire, moistens the Lungs, nourishes the Kidneys, generates fluids and resolves Phlegm.
Moistens the Lungs, nourishes Yin, stops cough and moistens the Intestines.
With Tian Men Dong, for Lung and Kidney Yin Deficiency with consumptive cough and occasional hemoptysis.
Clears Heat, reduces Fire, eliminates irritability, cools the Blood and relieves toxicity.
Clears Heat, dries Dampness, drains Fire, detoxifies and calms ascending Liver Yang.
Drains Heat from the Lungs, stops cough, calms wheezing and promotes urination.
With Huang Qin, drains Heat from the Lungs, and stops cough and wheezing.
Clears Heat, transforms Phlegm and stops cough.
Stops cough, calms wheezing, moistens the Intestines and unblocks bowels.
With Mai Men dong, for dry cough due to Dryness and Heat injuring the Lungs.
(Clears Heat and transforms Hot Phlegm - May substitute for Xing Ren.)
Moistens the Lungs, resolves Phlegm, stops cough, clears Heat, relieves Fire toxicity and moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs.
With Jie Geng, for pain and swelling of the throat.
Moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs.
Warms the Lungs, stops cough and reduces the toxicity of other herbs.
With Da Zao, prevents Phlegm accumulation.
Clears the Lungs
Transforms Phlegm
Relieves cough
Drains Fire
Moistens Dryness
syndromes: Lung Heat generating Lung Yin Deficiency

manifestations.pulse: Thready and rapid or Deep and rapid

contraindications: Contraindicated for those with Exterior disorders.
Use with caution or modify for those with Spleen Deficiency.
Use with caution or modify for those with Food Stagnation.

notes: This formula is very effective in treating Lung Heat and chronic cough with profuse sputum.

modifications.purpose: Phlegm-Fire cough with a red face, fever and blood-streaked sputum
a chronic sore throat with a raspy voice
severe sore throat or throat lesions
a chronic cough with spontaneous sweat
